topic.title: Output Tab (XML to PDF with CSS Transformations)

keywords.indexterm: XML to PDF with CSS transformation scenarioOutput tab

body.p: The Output tab contains the following options:

dlentry.dd: If selected, automatically opens the result of the transformation in a system application associated with the PDF file type (for example, in Windows PDF files are often opened in Acrobat Reader).
Select this option to include (dump) the intermediate, annotated XML file in the same location as the output file. This can be used for debugging purposes.
Select this option to include (dump) the FO file (before it is converted to PDF) in the same location as the output file. This can be used for debugging purposes.
